title: Taiwan’s Battle Against Disinformation – Fact-Checking in the Face of Election Interference
description: In the midst of Taiwan’s preparations for a significant election, the island is grappling with a surge of disinformation propagated by China, adding a layer of complexity to an already tense geopolitical situation. The keyword “disinformation” takes center stage as Taiwanese citizens and authorities navigate through a web of falsehoods aimed at influencing public opinion […]
